name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Opportunity_Strikes_C
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Opportunity Strikes C
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}% . This enhancement can only be slotted by Sentinels and may be slotted into any Sentinel damage power and requires the user to be level 50.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Damage and Increases Attack Rate
